CustomField.formula: KYC_next_review_date__c < TODAY() || isblank(KYC_next_review_date__c ) || RMC_ID_Card_Expiry_Date__c < TODAY() || isblank(RMC_ID_Card_Expiry_Date__c ) || RMC_Suitability_Risk_Expiry_Date__c < TODAY() || isblank(RMC_Suitability_Risk_Expiry_Date__c ) || RTL_FATCA__c != 'N'
CustomField.label: Regulation Alert
